Class RemoteBurnDeviceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.igeekinc.util.discburning.remote.RemoteBurnDeviceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BurnDeviceStatusChangedListener, RemoteBurnDevice, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener

extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteBurnDevice, BurnDeviceStatusChangedListener
